backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access control, contact form submission storage, and user profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a footer website-link requirement and associated files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of autogenerated summaries for all frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling hash-based routing between the home site and admin panel.
Admin panel with Internet Identity login, profile setup, admin check, and submissions table.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button that manages authentication state and clears query cache.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Marketing about section describing company experience and offerings.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section with business info cards and a validated form submitted through a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with headline, description, call-to-action buttons, and a hero image with scroll-to-section logic.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Displays product/service cards and a gallery of installation images using predefined service data.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Shows a grid of reasons highlighting company strengths, each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer with brand info, contact details, copyright text, and external/admin links.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, navigation buttons, smooth scrolling, and a mobile menu via a sheet component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Manages contact form state, validation, submission via mutation, and provides status and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin checks, fetching submissions, submitting forms, and getting/saving the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/styles with custom OKLCH theme variables, light/dark palettes, globals, and utility components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site purpose, requirements, known issues, and existing implemented features.
